00005 const char *CALICE::ErrorBits::__name[kNErrorBits]={
00006   "NoEventData",
00007   "MissingAdcBlock", 
00008   "MissingVLinkHeader",
00009   "InvalidTrigger", 
00010   "BadConfigData", 
00011   "WrongTriggerCounter",
00012   "CorruptEventRecord",
00013   "MissingTriggerRecord", 
00014   "CorruptAcquisition",
00015   "TDCOutOfSynch",
00016   "DirtyEvent",

00023 std::map<std::string, unsigned short> CALICE::ErrorBits::__nameToBit;
00024 
00027 unsigned int CALICE::ErrorBits::getErrorBit(const std::string &name) {
00028   if (CALICE::ErrorBits::__nameToBit.empty()) {
00029     for (unsigned int  bit_i=0; bit_i<kNErrorBits; bit_i++) {
00030       __nameToBit[__name[bit_i] ] = bit_i;
00031     }
00032   }
00033   std::map<std::string, unsigned short>::const_iterator error_bit= __nameToBit.find(name);
00034   if (error_bit != __nameToBit.end()) {
00035     return error_bit->second;
00036   }
00037   else {
00038     return kNErrorBits;
00039   }
00040 
00041 }
00042 
00043 unsigned int CALICE::ErrorBits::getErrorBitMask(const std::vector< std::string> &error_names) 
00044 {
00045     // build error mask
00046     unsigned int error_mask = 0;
00047     for(std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator error_iter = error_names.begin();
00048         error_iter != error_names.end();
00049         error_iter++) {
00050 
00051       unsigned int error_bit = CALICE::ErrorBits::getErrorBit(*error_iter);
00052 
00053       assert (  error_bit < CALICE::ErrorBits::kNErrorBits  );
00054 
00055       error_mask |= (1<<error_bit);
00056 
00057     }
00058     return error_mask;
00059 }
00060 
00061 
00062 std::ostream &CALICE::ErrorBits::print(std::ostream &out) const
00063 {
00064   if (_errorBits!=0) {
00065     
00066     unsigned int mask_i=1;
00067     out << "Errors: ";
00068     for (unsigned int  bit_i=0; bit_i<kNErrorBits; bit_i++) {
00069       if (_errorBits & mask_i) {
00070         out << getErrorName(bit_i) << " ";
00071       }
00072       mask_i <<= 1;
00073     }
00074   }
00075   return out;
00076 }
